Dead by Daylight is a great horror game. It's very fun to play and consists of four survivors trying to escape from one killer. You can choose between different survivors and perks to go with them as well as different killers with perks to go with them too. No level is the same since every time you play the maps are randomized menaing even when you're on the same map it will be set up different each time. This game is great, I haven't had any trouble with it since I've had it. If you have played Friday the 13th: The Game and liked it then you'll love this one by far.
great game just wish there was in game coms but other than that i love this game spent multiple hours on ps4 so i had to pick it up on pc

This game is fun! There is no middle between so i'm picking yes!  The only problem I ran into is that it lags and doesn't want to run, I even set the graphics to the lowest setting, and the loading screen still glitches. Please make work on making this game more functionable for all players.

The game is fun to play but it got the most toxic community I ever witnessed in a video game (and I know nearly every gamer community known to be extra toxic) but that's what makes it so much fun for me.
If there happens to be any game breaking bug (spots survivors can glitch into but killers can't reach, killers are not allowed to use their ability anymore, sprint burst can be used multiple times without cool down) nearly all survivors in higher ranks will abuse it. If you win as a killer on a high rank you will most likely get insulted by survivors.
Despite the communities Toxicity nearly every update will bring game breaking bugs into the game (the game not ending for the killer after the endgame collapse or the killer glitching into walls they can't escape).

[h1]Dead By DayLight[/h1]
     Gra, w kt√≥rej na mapƒô lƒÖduje piƒôciu graczy. Czterech z nich stajƒÖ siƒô bezbronnymi lud≈∫mi, z kolei piƒÖty zostaje seryjnym zab√≥jcƒÖ.

Gracze po stronie uciekinier√≥w, przed rozpoczƒôciem rozgrywki majƒÖ mo≈ºliwo≈õƒá wybrania dla siebie postaci spo≈õr√≥d 22, (nie wszystkie sƒÖ za darmo wiƒôkszo≈õƒá jest z DLC), tak samo jest z graczem grajƒÖcym zab√≥jcƒÖ r√≥wnie≈º posiada opcje wyboru spo≈õr√≥d 20 killer`√≥w (jak w przypadku ocala≈Çych, wiƒôkszo≈õƒá killer√≥w jest p≈Çatnych). Rozgrywka trwa do momentu ucieczki ocala≈Çych przez bramy, lub ukryty w≈Çaz, albo gdy wszyscy uciekinierzy zostanƒÖ zabici przez mordercƒô. W samej grze znajduje siƒô oko≈Ço 15 lokacji, na kt√≥rych znajdujƒÖ siƒô r√≥≈ºnego typu przeszkody i skrzynie z przedmiotami. Osoby grajƒÖce uciekinierami widzƒÖ grƒô z perspektywy trzeciej osoby, za≈õ morderca ma perspektywƒô pierwszej osoby, co utrudnia mu odnalezienie ocala≈Çych np: w wysokiej trawie.

Choƒá przyjemnie mi siƒô gra w Dead By Daylight to jest jedna wada a chodzi tu o graczy z rangƒÖ 20, kt√≥rzy kompletnie nie umiejƒÖ graƒá killer`em i face campiƒÖ przy haku i przez takich ludzi nie tylko ja tracimy rangi, ale tak to spoko.

Apesar de sua infinidade de bugs (temos que concordar) que espero que arrumem, √© um otimo jogo com sistemas de ranks muito inovador.

Criticas: Acho que deveriam prestar mais aten√ß√£o nos bugs do jogo; o Hillbily pode ver atraves das paredes com a serra; o Freddy consegue te acertar de muito mais longe do que ele deveria; alguns perks simplesmente funcionam quando querem; v√°rios erros de tradu√ß√£o no jogo e desbalanceamento dos lados (survivor √© bem mais f√°cil de jogar que killer).

Pr√≥s: Sistema de ranks muito inovador e incrivel, diferente de qualquer outro jogo; jogabilidade super suave e controles maravilhosos; bons graficos; premia√ß√µes justas e sentimento recompensador ap√≥s ganhar uma partida.

Apesar de tudo, √© um jogo muito bom que recomendo caso queira gastar umas boas horas da sua vida.

Update: Everything is still accurate since my initial review. Surprise surprise.

[h1] I can't decide if I should classify this game as an abusive relationship or some kind of stockholm syndrome. [/h1] 

TL:DR - There's too many gameplay and balancing issues to ignore unless you fit into 1 of the 2 categories above, which it seems like a majority of players do.

This game is only popular because there's no competition yet. Games like VHS and Evil Dead are similar but don't have as much traction as Dead by Daylight. Evil Dead was just released and looks extremely fun compared to DBD.

I don't launch the game anymore unless my [u]one[/u] specific friend asks me to play, and it's usually just to meme on it/destroy killers.

_________

Buy it on a sale if you're looking to play Survivor and have at least 2-3 friends. It's probably one of the worst games in my library to solo queue in since there's always strong inconsistency in your team's skill level compared to yours. If there is at least 1 survivor on your team that isn't too skilled, the rest of the match will become an unenjoyable struggle. 

If this happens, you'll most likely be running the Killer around for a majority of the match while your teammates are hiding in lockers or crouching around the map (which isn't how they help you escape/win).

_________

Don't buy it if you're looking to have a single non-stressful match as Killer. Survivors will most likely dominate you in the slightly higher ranks and you'll be juggled around with their coordination, crutch/second-chance perks and their occasional flashlight/fast toolbox.

This is the reason why I, and many others, don't play killer anymore.

_________

If you have some morals and a decent Survivor team, you'll occasionally feel bad for winning because of how badly you beat the Killer. There's matches where the Killer gets 0-25% of their objective done at the end of the game. Just feels like a bullying simulator half the time because of how imbalanced everything is.

If the Killer is doing too well, survivors will just DC (disconnect) or give up and stop moving all together. 

If you're playing a Killer they don't like (usually the strongest ones like Nurse and Blight), the survivors will also DC. I've honestly done that too, but that was back when I didn't really know how to play the game and I thought some aspects were too overpowered/uncounterable, like Bubba's chainsaw. I've seen survivors with more than double my playtime do that in high MMR. It's toxic and they 100% know how to play against the Killer but chose not to because it's harder than other ones you can face.

_________

The gameplay developers also make extremely questionable decisions. Most updates make the game worse for killers and better for survivors, which fits the bias they've had for years.

There are currently 204 perks in the game (including DLC). Killers have 97 perks while survivors have 107. You can only use 4 in a match. 

It sounds like there's a lot of different combinations and perks builds you can do, but there is so much bloat and terribly designed perks in this game that most people only run the same 5 meta perks because the other 100~ are inferior due to how they're all balanced. You'll occasionally see someone using 1-2 off meta perks, but they're usually paired with the 5 meta perk options I mentioned above. This makes the game very stale very quick. 

You can obviously not use any of the 5 meta perks to shake things up, but anything else is a severe downgrade in a majority of the matches.

I won't go any further into their bad gameplay decisions, but anyone who's play for long enough (and isn't a brainwashed survivor main) knows there's a lot of them. The developers also have too much of an ego and ignore ideas that would better the game. If they didn't think of the idea themselves, there's a 99% chance it'll never be in the game.

The art team/developers on the other hand are amazing at their jobs. Environments on the updated maps are fantastic and so are the skins and killer designs. Main menu and killer chase music is usually great.

10/10 for the art team and music team. Sorry your talent is getting thrown into this game.
1/10 for the developers who thoughts endless speed healing circles were a good idea.

_________

Everything I've said is all on top of Dead by Daylight being one of the most toxic gaming communities (teabags and macro/autoclicker flashlight spamming, endgame text chat), random and purposeful DC's from both sides, paywall perks that are need to win most matches in the current meta, mindless in-game point grinding that's exponentially getting worse with every update, face camping (which is a pretty viable killer strategy but is the most boring play style in any game I've ever played) and roleplaying Killers (Bubba's basement box defending, which is basically throwing the game and not making it fun for anyone).

Dead by Daylight is not a great gaming experience. It's better than it was years ago, but the gameplay development isn't going in the right direction. I don't launch the game anymore unless my one friend asks me to play, and it's usually just to meme on it.

This game is only popular because there's no competition yet. Games like VHS and Evil Dead are similar but don't have as much traction as Dead by Daylight. Evil Dead was just released and looks extremely fun compared to DBD

Overall, watching DBD on Youtube and living vicariously through Tru3 or Otzdarva is more enjoyable than actually playing the game yourself.
_________

Dead By Daylight √© um jogo infelizmente "falido" demorando muito para achar uma partida e quando encontra tem players muito t√≥xicos para jogar contra, um jogo que deveria ser jogado em equipe acaba sendo um jogo frustrante e incomodativo devido a falta de maturidade dos players. O jogo em si tem tudo para ser bom, um jogo que quando se encontra uma partida com players n√£o infantis (tanto o killer quanto os survivors) acaba sendo muito divertido. Infelizmente o Matchmaking devido aos poucos players ativos acaba sendo muito distante, um killer iniciante caindo com players antigos com o rank alto, isso acaba sendo chato para os novos jogadores e para gente (ranks alto) n√£o se torna um jogo desafiante o que acaba n√£o trazendo novos jogadores entusiasmados para o game, mesmo com o final de semana gratuito da steam que frequentemente √© disponibilizado os players novos s√≥ ve√™m a parte ruim do game.
Eu continuo jogando o game mas normalmente jogo ou em partidas fechadas apenas com amigos ou quando valendo rank jogo com eu e mais 1 ou dois amigos, O jogo pode ser muito divertido e bem aflito se em uma partida boa.
a behaviour pode estar tentando trazer o game de volta e eu acredito nisso por√©m a comunidade deixa isso quase imposs√≠vel para a empresa

After purchasing this game somehow years ago and now rejoining for a few rounds (thanks Whore!) I have finally come to the conclusion that this game is and always was... Actual shit... The characters suck, there is a limited amount of ways to escape. The killers can STILL ATTACK YOU WHEN CARRYING GROWN ASS OLD ASS MEN!

How anybody can enjoy this game, in any significant way is beyond me. I'd much rather play a game that doesn't suck the literal shit out of my life hours.

EDIT: After playing many more hours with friends I have come to the conclusion that my first early evaluation of the game was correct. But on top of this now, we have shitty mobile players and a dead server list... It takes 3 people 20 minutes to queue at 9:30 PM EST... This is ridiculous and at this point I hope they go free to play just to get review bombed... This game is so bad... It's probably one of the worst "Team Horror" games I've ever played in my 20+ years of online gaming... I cannot explain to you the amount of afk de-ranking killers, and shitty good for nothing mobile players I have had to deal with. I would not be playing the game if I hadn't been given the game from a desperate degenerate, wanting to play this game with someone since the game is... DEAD!


I ABSOLUTELY HOPE THIS GAME STAYS DEAD!


P.S. for DBD 2, Decrease hooks, make it F2P since you know it's going to die, & spend more time on balancing...

Dead by Daylight es un buen juego para aquellas personas que no tiene problemas con que este se vuelva repetitivo, el juego toma un asesino que persigue a cuatro supervivientes en su intento por reparar 5 generadores y escapar de el, despues de algunas horas puedo decir que el juego sigue siendo disfrutable, la comunidad es algo toxica y las partidas a veces algo frustrantes, pero en general es un buen juego.

Unballanced garbage with idiotic addons and cheating functions (like aura reading in the game where u have to hide - what a dumb devs XD) and cheated perks for killers + useless perks for survivors. Imbecile community (90%) and lots of broken mechanics. DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS GARBAGE!!!
Juego adictivo, logra atrapar al jugador para alcanzar los objetivos. Si eres amante del terror y del mundo macabro, recomiendo pasarte horas con este fabuloso titulo!
